html:
12.28.21  3:22 pm   how does music help us feel so much better? Not just the words or lyrics, but everything else, too  - the sounds, the instruments, the rhythm, etc… how is music so good? and how come some people don't like music????

     it gets directly to the 'point' of life, which, if you ask yourself what it is, it's hard to answer, but it comes down to playing with time. music plays with time on a vast range of timescales, from minutes all the way down to milliseconds

12.28.21  2:57 pm   should i make a deal with the devil 

     if it's the right deal. if not, be prepared to walk away

12.28.21  2:27 pm   im stuck on top of a ladder pls send help

      ok i'll be right over

12.28.21  2:10 pm   is music everywhere even though you dont know that it's music but for some reason it can or cannot be music music?

     that sounds fine with me

12.28.21  2:05 pm   have u ever had a dream?

      it's me, i'm the dream

12.28.21  1:11 pm   thoughts about thoughts questions?

     they're ok

12.28.21  1:05 pm   What music genre(s) do you listen to the most?

     none of the music files i listen to have a genre label affixed to them. yet, they are all surprisingly good, despite this

12.28.21  11:16 am   opinions on poland

      'just right'

12.28.21  10:10 am   how do you deal with a broken heart?

      burst into song

12.28.21  9:51 am   do you like unicorns?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.28.21  8:58 am   is your main goal right now music?

     well, sort of. my main goal is to relax my mind, so as to not be so paralyzed under the pressure of itself

12.28.21  8:26 am   did you wish merry christmas to anyone this year?

      yes, everyone

12.28.21  7:16 am   IVE JUST GOT A NEW GUITAR!!!!!!!! one that i've been craving for long..... turns out it's pass certificate was signed exactly 1 year before today, i'm feeling like i have adopted a baby orphan at their first birthday, with lots of love!!!!!!! one of my happiest......

i've decided to learn and love everything i could do with it. for celebration purposes. dear kind sparkling gentleman, would you please offer me one really cool song to learn?? let it be as simple and gentle as a warm breeze in a cold winter day, so that it will welcome me and i would not get horrified by, however with halls of room for post-learnt playful dancing with it. i wanted one from you as well, since you are one of my mosthelpful favorite music teachers.

     i can't recommend a finite number of songs unless i know you extremely extremely well. otherwise, my standard recommendation is all the songs. that's because they're all good

12.28.21  5:10 am   does art have to be made with some kind of intent

     sure, if you can figure out what intent means

12.28.21  4:10 am   What's the most memorable meal you've ever eaten? 

     i don't remember any meals

12.28.21  1:48 am   Have you ever been lost metaphysically? Stranded wandering the halls within yourself wondering what all this is for?

      yes, but it's more often that i have the opposite problem and i find too much meaning and it explodes my brain in such a way that it has a negative effect on my ability to conduct ordinary business transactions

12.28.21  1:10 am   who was your favorite backstreet boy

      max

12.28.21  1:04 am   what's your favourite word to describe any given person?

      normal

12.28.21  12:36 am   Do you like people, generally speaking?

      yes

12.28.21  12:09 am   what do you like to do in your free time?

      my time is actually very expensive

12.27.21  11:47 pm   is your next song epic?.

      it might be

12.27.21  7:44 pm   Why do the songs go that way

      why not

12.27.21  5:58 pm   what was the greatest mixing and mastering trick or technique you've ever heard?

      low cut the non-bass non-kick instruments just a little bit, to make room for the actual bass and kick instruments

12.27.21  5:56 pm   Hi, 2022 is near, any new year's resolution?

      i make resolutions at different times. new year's resolutions automatically fail. to illustrate this, i'd challenge you to find anyone who is still adhering to their new year's resolution from last new years

12.27.21  5:28 pm   opinion on geometry? 

      dank

12.27.21  1:18 pm   hi bill, I've reached a bit of a dilemma. I don't know wether to listen to more songs or less. I feel like listening to more songs can give me a bit more ideas on how to write songs, yet I'm afraid that it might corrupt me and make me less original in my music. What do you think?
Also, thank you for being so helpful through your answers. You are an amazing musician!

      i've tried both ways and i think both ways are the answer

12.27.21  9:37 am   what is the liquid form of bread?

      mush

12.27.21  8:46 am   how do you let your creativity look good when you convey it in an art medium (especially in music) bc when i have a spark of creativity, the things that i make dont satisfy me and doesn't reflect what i can do

      just keep doing it and try to get comfortable. or uncomfortable, that works too sometimes

12.27.21  8:30 am   hey bill do you have any college tips

      no

12.27.21  7:29 am   how to not get distracted while working?

      do something else and then let the work distract you from that

12.27.21  7:11 am   what do you think of the philippines

      they have a lot of cities

12.27.21  5:33 am   how do you counter boredom brought by the future

      how about changing the world

12.27.21  4:58 am   How did you know that we would be able to #relate?

      just a lucky guess i suppose

12.27.21  12:52 am   Is harmony sometimes dependant on rhythm?

     sure

     Say I have a melody i came up with. Depending on which notes i choose to harmonize i could potentially end up with different harmonies couldnt I?

     yes

12.26.21  11:50 pm   new vid when

      right away

12.26.21  11:35 pm   is it possible to make music only using car parts (e.g. the engine, blinkers, etc.)

      yes

12.26.21  9:00 pm   is there a moment from a katy perry song that you like?

      most of 'never really over'

12.26.21  5:34 pm   How do you make your songs?

      i don't know

12.26.21  12:04 pm   how to be patient?.

      i will tell you later

12.26.21  8:29 am   In your song New Canaan, why do you insist so much in the fact that every word you say is true? Also you say "cause' I lie about details when my dreams don't come true", so does it mean that because every word you say is true, your dreams did come true? Love that song btw

      that's the real point of everything in there. is to try to get you to love the song

12.26.21  7:51 am   why do you switch between saying "nothing is funny" and "everything is funny"? what is the truth?

      they're both funny

12.26.21  7:17 am   thoughts on potatoes

      the flavor overwhelms me

12.26.21  12:47 am   If you wrote a book, but you only had 400 pages with 12pt font and double spacing to work with, thus not having enough space to write about everything, what would you write it about?

      you can write about everything in any amount of space

12.25.21  11:59 pm   does any question surprise you anymore

      no

12.25.21  9:27 pm   am i real

      let me perform some calculations

12.25.21  8:57 pm   Should we just start killing each other?

      no

12.25.21  8:30 pm   If music is just vibrations does that mean I can vibrate so hard that I create music?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.25.21  7:58 pm   how are you doing?

      pretty good

12.25.21  7:54 pm   are you stupid

      even better

12.25.21  7:23 pm   How do you keep up a good conversation?

      just tell the truth. and if you don't know it, then ask the other person what the truth is. and if you've already told each other, then you could start memorizing all of earth's geography together
